## Load package

```{r packages, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(echos)
library(tidyverse)
library(tsibble)
library(fable)
```


```{r data}
m4_data

p <- ggplot()

p <- p + geom_line(
  data = m4_data,
  aes(
    x = index,
    y = value),
  linewidth = 0.5
)

p <- p + facet_wrap(
  vars(series),
  ncol = 2,
  scales = "free")

p <- p + labs(x = "Time")
p <- p + labs(y = "Value")
p

```
